Yes No Aurora Inn Home Services Casino Contacts Home Services Casino Contacts Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how Aurora Inn collects, uses, and protects your personal information. 1. Introduction Welcome to Aurora Inn. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and interact with our services. Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this policy, please do not access the site. 2. Information We Collect We may collect personal information from you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect includes: Personal Identification Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details. Payment Information: Credit card details and billing information for reservations and purchases. Reservation Details: Check-in and check-out dates, room preferences, and special requests. Usage Data: Information about your interactions with our website and services, including IP addresses and browser information. 3. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in the following ways: To process and manage your reservations and bookings. To communicate with you regarding your stay, including confirmations, updates, and promotional offers. To improve our website and services based on your feedback and usage patterns. To process transactions and handle payments securely. To respond to your inquiries, requests, and customer service needs. 4. How We Protect Your Information We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. These measures include: Secure servers and encrypted connections to protect data transmission. Access controls and authentication procedures to restrict unauthorized access to personal information. Regular security audits and updates to safeguard against vulnerabilities and threats. 5. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following situations: Service Providers: We may share information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services to you. Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required to do so by law or in response to a valid request by public authorities. Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction. 6. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also have the right to object to or restrict certain types of processing. To exercise your rights, please contact us using the information provided below. 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and other tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small files placed on your device that help us understand your preferences and improve our services. You can control cookie settings through your browser. 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website. 9. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your information, please contact us at aurorainn@gmail.com Aurora Inn Home Services Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer

Our top-notch services are designed to cater to your every need, ensuring comfort, convenience, and luxury throughout your visit. Book Now Indulge in Timeless Elegance and Comfort Welcome to Aurora Inn, where every aspect of your stay is crafted to perfection. Our mission is to provide an unparalleled experience with our array of premium services, tailored to meet the needs of our discerning guests. From the moment you arrive, you will be embraced by a warm and welcoming atmosphere, with a team of dedicated professionals ready to cater to your every need. Our luxurious accommodations are complemented by top-notch facilities and services, designed to enhance your stay and ensure your utmost comfort and satisfaction. Indulge in our exquisite dining options, where culinary excellence meets local and international flavors. Relax and rejuvenate at our full-service spa, offering a range of treatments to soothe your mind and body. Stay active and fit with our state-of-the-art fitness center, or take advantage of our well-equipped business center to stay productive on the go. Whether you are here for a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a business trip, Aurora Inn offers a variety of services to make your stay unforgettable. Elevate Your Stay: Discover Our Premier Amenities Luxury Accommodations Our rooms are designed with your comfort in mind, featuring plush bedding, stylish decor, and modern amenities. Spa and Wellness Relax and rejuvenate with our full-service spa, offering massages, facials, and other wellness treatments. Event Spaces Host your next event in our elegant venues, equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and attentive service. Concierge Services Our concierge team is available to assist with reservations, recommendations, and any special requests you may have. Your Comfort, Our Commitment From the moment you step through our doors, you will be greeted with a warm welcome and a dedication to service that is second to none. Our team of passionate professionals is committed to anticipating your needs and exceeding your expectations at every turn. We strive to create a sanctuary where you can unwind and rejuvenate, whether you are here for a business trip, a family vacation, or a romantic getaway. At Aurora Inn, we understand that true luxury lies in the details. This is why we offer a range of world-class amenities designed to enhance your stay. Our elegantly appointed rooms and suites provide a serene escape, featuring plush bedding, state-of-the-art technology, and breathtaking views. Our gourmet dining options cater to every palate, with menus crafted from the finest locally-sourced ingredients. Beyond comfort and luxury, we are deeply committed to sustainability and community engagement. We believe in responsible tourism and take great pride in implementing eco-friendly practices throughout our property. Our partnerships with local organizations allow us to contribute positively to the community, ensuring that our impact extends beyond our walls.
